meanings.definition: A toxin that destroys red blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The hemotoxin caused the red blood cells to break down.
meanings.sent2: Doctors were concerned about the effects of the hemotoxin on the patient's blood cells.
meanings.sent3: The hemotoxin decided to have a party in the bloodstream, but it got out of control.
meanings.sent4: The hemotoxin was like a silent intruder, slowly damaging the red blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The hemotoxin's attack on the red blood cells was relentless and destructive.

meanings.definition: A poisonous substance that affects the blood.
meanings.sent1: The hemotoxin in the snake venom can be very dangerous.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the effects of the hemotoxin on the blood circulation.
meanings.sent3: The hemotoxin thought it was a vampire, trying to suck the life out of the blood.
meanings.sent4: The hemotoxin's influence on the blood was like a dark cloud hanging over the body.
meanings.sent5: The hemotoxin's presence in the bloodstream was like a ticking time bomb, waiting to cause harm.
